document.full_text: european golf officials must decide between honoring the memory of spanish great seve ballesteros and taking the ryder cup to new lands when they choose the venue for the 2018 edition on tuesday.
document.title: ballesteros factor could influence ryder cup 2018 decision
lines_and_colors: european golf officials must decide between honoring the memory of spanish great seve ballesteros and taking the ryder cup to new lands when they choose the venue for the 2018 edition on tuesday.
